name: Traversal (JadonTheDev, Hanushi, fluxsauce, HaloVincent, Vyck21, goldie4101)
name_original: Traversal (JadonTheDev, Hanushi, fluxsauce, HaloVincent, Vyck21, goldie4101)
description:
Use your glider and grappling hook to navigate an open world... but you'll have no minimap, compass, or quest markers. Use only hand-drawn maps to find where you are in the world, and where you need to go.

Discover a new world and use your navigation skills to find what the maps are hiding.

Made on January 3-13, 2021 for the annual #7DFPS game jam. All game assets were made during the jam. including code, 3D models, sound effects, music, and art.

  • Game Concept, Programming - Jadon Mullinex
  • Programming - Pelham Cox  (Bedrock Studios Official)
  • 3D Modeling, World Design - goldie4101 (Goldie)
  • Sound Design - Vyck21 (Victor de Lipski)
  • Music Composer - fluxsauce (Jon Peck / Null Confluence)
    • Listen to the 6-track Soundtrack
  • Map Drawings - Hanushi (Hannah Mullinex)
